pages.text: The $(thing)furnace engine$() burns items to move the boat. The burn duration of an item determines how much the item will move the boat at $(6)0.04 * $(italics)Imposed Speed$() blocks / tick$(), where $(italics)Imposed Speed$() is the speed set inside the menu.

A single slot is available for the fuel item. $(#ff0000)If empty, the furnace engine will pull from any available $(l:modules/spots#storage)storage module.$()$()$(br2)The engine is locked by default, preventing the boat from moving, but does not consume items.$(br2)The speed can be adjusted from this menu.$(br)$(italics)Imposed speed$() is the speed imposed by $(l:modules/spots#navigation)Navigation modules$(), and acts as a multiplier of the speed set inside this interface.
The interface also displays an estimation of how long the engine will be fueled by the items currently inside it.
